name: Fire
text: This secret speaks of fire and flame, of ash and ember.
You can light candles, small campfires, and torches with a touch  and small flames like these will not harm you.
ritual: you learn the Bonfire ritual.
invocation: You learn the Flame Bolt invocation.
finalmastery: All fire invocations deal an extra dice of damage. You learn Inferno and Blessings of the Flame.

name: Water
text: This secret speaks of flowing, of balance, of rivers and water.
ritual: You learn the Create Trickle ritual
invocation: You learn the Shape Water invocation
secondmastery: You learn Water Whip and gain a swimming speed equal to your movement speed.
finalmastery: You Tsunami and can  breath underwater.

name: Ice
text: This secret speaks of frozen waste and howling wind. When you select this secret, you can lower the temperature around yourself a little. You can also cause small bits of water like that in a cup or a trickle of rain to freeze over.
ritual: You learn the  Heart of Ice ritual
invocation: You learn the Freezing Blast invocation
finalmastery: You learn Blizzard. You become immune to the cold and learn the Soul of Ice ceremony.

name: Stone
text: This secret speaks of steady stone and solid earth.
You can shape small stones into different shapes or change their colour slightly.
ritual: You learn the Stone Skin ritual
invocation: You learn Boulder
finalmastery: You learn Stone Building. You cannot be moved against your will while standing on the ground.

name: Air
text: This secret speaks of wind and cloud, of silent breeze and sudden gale.
You can create a light breeze at will.
ritual: None
invocation: You learn the Wind Step invocation.
finalmastery: You learn Stride of the Wind. You weigh half as much and your movement speed increases by 10 ft. You take no fall damage.

name: The Storm
text: This secret speaks of wind, clouds, lightning, and thunder.
You can cause a light breeze to blow at will.
ritual: You learn the Clear Skies ritual.
invocation: You learn the Gusting Wind invocation.
finalmastery: You learn Stormlord Ceremony. Wind will never move you against your will.

name: Daemon Protection
text: This secret is found in holy book and divine tome.
You have learned to identify daemons. You gain +5 on checks to learn about such creatures.
ritual: You learn the Protection ritual.
invocation: None
finalmastery: You learn Banish. You have advantage on all saves against an effect from a daemon.
limit: You cannot take this secret if you have the Secret of Daemon Summoning.

name: Daemon Summoning
text: This secret whispers of forbidden knowledge and long lost power. Knowing these secrets is forbidden in almost all the world.
You have learned to identify daemons. You gain +5 on checks to learn about such creatures.
ritual: You learn the Contact Daemon ritual.
invocation: None
finalmastery: You learn Scion of the Daemon Lords. You have advantage on all saves against an effect from a daemon.
limit: You cannot take this secret if you have the Secret of Daemon Protection.

name: Plants
text: This secret speaks of vine and root, of plants of all types.
You gain the ability to cause flowers to grow at your touch. These flowers wither after a few hours.
ritual: You learn the Forest Sense ritual.
invocation: You learn the Grasping Vine invocation
finalmastery: You can speak with plants and can cast Awaken once per long downtime.

name: Shadow
text: This secret speaks of darkness and shadow, of hidden things and twisting dark.
You can cause lights to dim and shadows to grow larger at will.
ritual: You learn the Shroud ritual.
invocation: You learn the Darkness invocation.
secondmastery: You learn Shadow Armour. You can see in low light
thirdmastery: While in darkness you can spend a turn to become invisible until you are in bright light. You learn Shadow Trap.
finalmastery: You learn Maddening Darkness. You gain a +3 bonus to stealth tests while in darkness or while invisible. The maximum range of shadow step increases to 1 mile at the cost of 6 casting ability points. You can see in magical darkness.

name: Death
text: This secret is as quiet as the grace. No whispers are here, nor speaking voice.
ritual: You learn the Gentle Repose ritual
invocation: You learn the Cause Wound invocation.
secondmastery: You learn Create Undead and Control Undead.
finalmastery: You learn Lichdom.

name: Light
text: This secret does not speak or whisper, it yells of divinity and blinding light
ritual: You learn the Light ritual.
invocation: You learn the Divine Radiance invocation
finalmastery: You learn the Avatar of Light Ceremony. Your light created by the light ritual last forever.

name: Protection
text: This secret holds a place within your heart, of safety and protecting light.
ritual: You learn the Mage Armor ritual.
invocation: You learn the Warding invocation.
finalmastery: You learn Invunerability. You gain damage reduction 2.

name: Nullification
text: This secret is a clash inside, a cacophony of nihilistic light.  When you learn this secret you gain magic reduction. If you already know detect magic from another secret its casting time, and the time to concentrate on an aura, is halved.
ritual: You learn the Detect Magic ritual.
invocation: None
secondmastery: You learn Abjuring Ward. When you attempt to dispel or counterspell a spell, the base cost of your spell counts as being 2 points higher.
finalmastery: You learn Antimagic Field. Your magic reduction increases to 5 and you have advantage on saves against spells. Your bonus to dispelling and counterspelling is increased to 4.

name: Arcane
text: If you already know detect magic from another secret its casting time, and the time to concentrate on an aura, is halved. You may change your arcane attack (if you have one) to magic damage.
ritual: You learn the Detect Magic ritual and the Alarm ritual.
invocation: None
thirdmastery: You learn Read Magic and you can identify all glyphs on sight.
finalmastery: You learn the Archmage Soul Ceremony

name: The Feather
text: This secret chips and squawks and caws, it flaps and flutters and flies away. When you learn this secret you can speak with birds.
ritual: You learn the Eagle Eye ritual.
invocation: You learn the Bird Scout invocation.
finalmastery: You learn Bird Transformation.

name: Spiders
text: This secret speaks of webs and flies, of many legs and many eyes.
When you learn this secret you gain +2 to armour class. You can summon small spiders and speak with spidren.
ritual: None
invocation: None
finalmastery: You learn Create Spidren. Your bonus to armour class increased to +5 and you can spider climb.

name: Glyphs
text: This secret draws lines and circles on the inside of your mind, their hidden meanings revealed.
When you learn this secret you learn 3 glyphs of your choosing from the minor glyph list
invocation: None
secondmastery: You learn one major glyph and one minor glyph.
finalmastery: You learn one master glyph and one major glyph. The cost to cast all glyphs is halved.

name: Steel
text: This secret rings eith the clanging of metal and whispers of the strength of steel and iron.
ritual: You learn the Strengthen Metal ritual
invocation: You learn the Shield Shard invocation
firstmastery: You have advantage on forging, appraising, or identifying metal items. You learn the Bolster invocation.
secondmastery: You learn the Summon Blade invocation.
thirdmastery: You learn the Heat Metal invocation.
finalmastery: Your AC increases by 2 while wearing metal armour. Your metal weapons deal an extra 2 points of damage. You learn the Heart of Steel Ceremony.

name: Control
text: You can speak with honeyed words, gaining up to a +5 bonus to a single charisma test at the rate of +1 per points of casting ability score spent.
ritual: You learn the Disguise ritual.
invocation: You learn the Minor Charm Invocation.
finalmastery: You learn Mass Charm. You have advantage on all charisma tests.

name: Blood
text: This secret speaks of a sanguine rush and pumping blood.
You are immune to any blood borne disease.
ritual: You learn Taste the Blood.
invocation: You learn the Gather Blood invocation.
finalmastery: You learn Bloodsplosion. Whenever you draw blood from an enemy you regain 1d6 defence.

name: Witchery
text: This secret sings of moonlight dances and ancient stones. Of beasts and birds and flames of old.
ritual: You learn the Moonlight Dancing ritual.
invocation: You learn the Witchbolt invocation.
secondmastery: You learn Roll the Bones and Touch of Pain.
thirdmastery: You learn Rend the Sould and Touch of Death.
finalmastery: You learn Cackle, Cauldron and Hagness

name: Golems
text: You learn the Create Golem Ritual
ritual: You learn the Create Golem Core Ritual
firstmastery: You learn Imbue Power. You learn a basic golem mystery.
thirdmastery: You learn a basic golem mystery and an advanced golem mystery
finalmastery: You learn the improve golem ceremony and a master golem mystery

name: Music
text: When you play music you can make smoke or mist move slightly, forming shapes or dancing along with your playing.
ritual: You learn the Recovery ritual.
invocation: You learn the Dissonant Chord invocation.
finalmastery: You learn Soul of Music and Voice of the Gods

name: Life
text: This secret speaks of healing and life.

When you learn this secret you gain the ability to heal with a touch. You gain a number of healing points equal to your maximum wisdom score. You can use your main action to move up to your movement speed and touch a creature and heal their defence for a number equal to the points you spend. You can also cure a minor wound by spending 10 points. You regain any lost points at the end of a long rest.
ritual: None
invocation: None
thirdmastery: You learn Word of Life and Healing Chant.
finalmastery: You learn Bring back the Dead

name: Insects
text: This secret hums and buzzes, dreaming of flapping wings and scuttering feet.
When you select this secret you can control small insects’ flights to make them form shapes in the air and small insects will never bite you.
ritual: You learn Signs of Nature
invocation: You learn the Swarm Cloud invocation
finalmastery: You learn Swarm Form. You are immune to poison damage.

name: Mushrooms
text: This secret is silent and cold, growing slowly in the shade and quiet.
When you learn this secret you can cause mushrooms to grow slowly around you as you sleep. You can always find food for yourself in areas where mushrooms grow.
ritual: You learn the Brew Mycelium ritual
invocation: You learn the Creeping Fungus invocation.
finalmastery: You learn the Lasting Death ceremony.

name: Horror
text: Whispering scratches on the inside of the kind, crawling and creeping and screaming and weeping.
The secrets of horror grant immunity to sanity damage. You cannot go insane if you are already insane!
ritual: None
invocation: None
finalmastery: None

name: The Deep
text: The secrets of the deep remove your need to breathe.
ritual: None
invocation: None
firstmastery: You learn Armour of the Deep.
secondmastery: You learn Call of the Deep.
thirdmastery: You learn Arms from the Deep.
finalmastery: None

name: The Stars
text: The secrets of the stars allow you to hover and fly. You gain a 20ft fly speed.
ritual: None
invocation: None
secondmastery: You learn Blade of the Void
thirdmastery: You learn Thing from the Stars.
finalmastery: None
